sect1.title: Metadata Legend
sect1.para: The metadata legend shows the shapes and colors of each type of item on the graph. This first screenshot displays this information for the concept classes of the graph.

Clicking on the first column's rectangle will launch a new window containing the color legend for the graph. It is possible to modify the current colors by clicking on them and selecting a new one. It is also possible to add new colors for other concept classes (not yet listed).
Clicking on the second column's shape will launch a new window displaying the shape legend for the graph. Like previously, it is possible to change or add its contents.
The following screenshot shows the Metadata Legend for the Controlled Vocabularies.

Clicking on the first column's rectangle will launch a new window containing the color legend for the graph. It is possible to modify the current colors by clicking on them and selecting a new one. It is also possible to add new colors for other concept classes (not yet listed).
Clicking on the second column (name of controlled vocabulary) will launch a small window describing the properties of this controlled vocabulary.
The following screenshot shows the Metadata Legend for the Relation Type Sets.

Clicking on the first column's rectangle will launch a new window containing the color legend for the graph. It is possible to modify the current colors by clicking on them and selecting a new one. It is also possible to add new colors for other concept classes (not yet listed).
Clicking on the second column (name of relation type set) will launch a small window describing the properties of this relation type set.
